tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lobbying_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR(255),
  official_name VARCHAR(255),
  organization_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE lobby_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_date DATE,
    lobbyist_name VARCHAR(255),
    government_official VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE government_officials (
    official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    official_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    contact_info VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE lobbyist_firms (
    firm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    firm_name VARCHAR(255),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    total_clients INT,
    industry_focus VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE lobbying_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  total_budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE government_officials (
  official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_name VARCHAR(255),
  official_title VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE lobbying_clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(255),
  total_expenditure DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE lobbying_interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_id INT,
  official_id INT,
  client_id INT,
  interaction_date DATE,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_description TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE lobbyists (lobbyist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, organization VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, contact_info VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, registration_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE government_officials (official_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, contact_info VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE lobbying_activities (activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lobbyist_id INT NOT NULL, official_id INT NOT NULL, activity_date DATE NOT NULL, activity_description TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (lobbyist_id) REFERENCES lobbyists(lobbyist_id), FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES government_officials(official_id));

CREATE TABLE meetings (meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lobbyist_id INT NOT NULL, official_id INT NOT NULL, meeting_date DATE NOT NULL, meeting_notes TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (lobbyist_id) REFERENCES lobbyists(lobbyist_id), FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES government_officials(official_id));

CREATE TABLE financial_contributions (contribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lobbyist_id INT NOT NULL, official_id INT NOT NULL, contribution_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, contribution_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (lobbyist_id) REFERENCES lobbyists(lobbyist_id), FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES government_officials(official_id));
